com.qtplaf.library.util.file

Class FileCopy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.task.TaskRunner
      • com.qtplaf.library.util.file.FileCopy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task, java.lang.Runnable

    public class FileCopy
extends TaskRunner
    Utility class to copy files from a list of source directories to a list of destination directories.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  FileCopy.CopyListener
      Copy listener.

      Count listener.
      (package private) class  FileCopy.PurgeListener
      Purge listener.
      (package private) class  FileCopy.ScanListener
      Task adapter to receive and forward events to the scanner task.

      A boolean that indicates whether destination should be purged, that is, non existing files in the source deleted.
